description: Least separator of first n Egyptian fractions; i.e. least k for which the integers Floor(k/m) for m=1,2,...n are distinct.
comments: For n > 1: A257213(a(n)) = n. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 19 2015
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (Haskell)a043548 n = f 1 where   f k = if distinct $ (map (div k)) [n, n-1 .. 1] then k else f (k + 1)   distinct [_] = True; distinct (u:vs@(v:_)) = u /= v && distinct vs-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 19 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
